channel.title: Musings of an #RLady
channel.description: Recent content on Musings of an #RLady

item.title: Make your own blog with blogdown
item.description: Start a new github repository for your website and name it anything you like. Use the R package blogdown to design your page with Hugo. The details are as follows: Create a local folder that is synced up to your currently empty github repo Create a project and do the following : install.packages(“blogdown”) library(blogdown) blogdown::install_hugo(force = TRUE) blogdown::new_site() install_theme(“yoshiharuyamashita/blackburn”, theme_example = TRUE, update_config = TRUE) remember to change the baseurl = “/” parameter in the config.

item.title: Make your own blog with blogdown
item.description: Start a new github repository for your website and name it anything you like. Use the R package blogdown to design your page with Hugo. The details are as follows: Create a local folder that is synced up to your currently empty github repo Create a project and do the following : install.packages(“blogdown”) library(blogdown) blogdown::install_hugo(force = TRUE) blogdown::new_site() install_theme(“yoshiharuyamashita/blackburn”, theme_example = TRUE, update_config = TRUE) remember to change the baseurl = “/” parameter in the config.

item.title: About
item.description: A comp sci/statistician/data scientist dabbling in everything! Thanks for reading!

item.title: Contact
item.description: <div class="pure-u-1 pure-u-md-1-3"> <label for="last-name">Last Name</label> <input id="last-name" class="pure-u-23-24" type="text"> </div> <div class="pure-u-1 pure-u-md-1-3"> <label for="email">E-Mail</label> <input id="email" class="pure-u-23-24" type="email" required> </div> <div class="pure-u-1 pure-u-md-1-3"> <label for="city">City</label> <input id="city" class="pure-u-23-24" type="text"> </div> <div class="pure-u-1 pure-u-md-1-3"> <label for="state">State</label> <select id="state" class="pure-input-1-2"> <option>AL</option> <option>CA</option> <option>IL</option> </select> </div> </div> <fieldset class="pure-group"> <input type="text" class="pure-input-1-2" placeholder="A title"> <textarea class="pure-input-1-2" placeholder="Your message"></textarea> </fieldset> <button type="submit" class="pure-button pure-button-primary">Send</button>
